attributes.action: Please change the law on water flouridation to give the public a choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Presently the health authorities can direct water companys to add flouride to an areas drinking water,more acuratly

Hexafluorosilicic Acid (H2SiF6)
H2SiF6 is a highly toxic, Class 8 Corrosive substance requiring that it be shipped in specially lined tanks or unbreakable plastic drums.Do you want this in your water,,,
please  speak out before this toxic waste is forced upon you and it will be,
this chemical has not been tested safe,and the instructions in the event of a spillage of this chemical make scary reading...

search    
NPWA for more info

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
